  • Method Details

    • saveMessage

      public int saveMessage​(String name, String encryptingType, String message)
      save client`s message in /resource/MessagesFile.txt file or in file specified in constructor
      Parameters:
      name - - identifier for data in 'MessagesFile.txt'
      encryptingType - - encrypting type of message, that server was given
      message - - message, that server was given
      Returns:
      - status codes = {-2, -1, 0} 0 - all is ok (message was saved to the file 'MessagesFile.txt'); -1 - file was not found; -2 - exception during input/output to the file 'MessagesFile.txt'.

    • loadMessage

      public String loadMessage​(String name)
      load client`s message from /resource/MessagesFile.txt file or from file specified in constructor
      Parameters:
      name - identifier of client`s encrypted message
      Returns:
      client`s encrypted message with next form "<tok>encryptingType</tok> <tok>message</tok>", if all is ok "Message, with given name, was not found", if there are no messages in file with name identifier "FileNotFound", if file /resource/MessagesFile.txt or file that specified in constructor was not found "InputOutputException", if there are some problems with reading file
